metadata.name: Enjoy the silence
metadata.description:
Unfortunately, people are abused. Children, adults, women and even men. Very often victims blame themselves, thinking that they are to blame and have provoked such a situation, but this is not true. No one should have to experience this in their life. Often children are abused in their own families and stay silent for years because they are afraid.

By buying this NFT, you will help me give some of the money to a charity for survivors of abuse.

Thank you in advance and let's make this world a kinder place.
